Class ModMeasureBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • co.uk.niadel.mpi.measuresmpi.ModMeasureBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModEnergyMeasure, ModFluidMeasure

    public abstract class ModMeasureBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The base for groups of measures.

    Niadel
